g\u00e9n\u00e9ral.title: ordre t litt hk
g\u00e9n\u00e9ral.text:
• poésie
1. #tag:italic:canzoniere#tag:italic:, pétrarque
2. présentation du bellay (org des#tag:italic: regrets#tag:italic: + du cours)
3. t19 "l'inspiration" et t25 "le génie" du bellay
4. #tag:italic:les tristes#tag:italic:, ovide, livre 3, 1 et livre 4, 1
5. #tag:italic:du bellay, ses "regrets" qu'il fit dans rome#tag:italic:, yvonne bellenger 
6. #tag:italic:la deffence ey illustration de la langue francoyse#tag:italic:
7. dissert litt, #tag:italic:le livre de mon bord#tag:italic:, pirre reverdy + analyse du sujet et pbq
8. dissert litt, #tag:italic:la conversation des po#tag:italic:ètes#tag:italic:, claude roy
9. #tag:italic:"barbare", #tag:italic:illuminations#tag:italic:, rimbaud
10.#tag:italic: #tag:italic:la notion d'écart poétique: #tag:italic:structure du langage poétique#tag:italic:, jean cohen#tag:italic:
#tag:italic:11. #tag:italic:l'étranger#tag:italic:, camus: l'écriture de l'absurde
12. #tag:italic:le roman mode d'emploi#tag:italic:, henri godard
13. corpus "le roman au XX: expérimentations de la modernité: #tag:italic:l'étranger#tag:italic:, #tag:italic:le bruit et la fureur#tag:italic:, #tag:italic: la route des flandres#tag:italic:, #tag:italic:la modification#tag:italic:
14. #tag:italic:du luxe et de l'impuissance#tag:italic:, jean-luc lagarce#tag:italic:
#tag:italic:

• théâtre
1. corpus "flamboiements tragiques" : #tag:italic:andromaque#tag:italic:, #tag:italic:britannicus#tag:italic:, #tag:italic:bérénice#tag:italic:
2. com litt : #tag:italic:phèdre#tag:italic:, racine, I, 1 + pbq et plan proposés
3. "étude de texte français, durée 5h" : #tag:italic:chat en poche#tag:italic:, georges feydeau, I, 1 + pbq, plan et courte analyse proposés

archives.title: laptop criteria
archives.text:
- no gpu
- 15.6" (=liam's)
- 16 gb ram

- resolution min 1080
- brightness min ~ 400 nits
- amoled vs ipslcd
- pixel dentsity (higher better)
- refresh rate (lower better)
- amd

linux.title: shortcuts
linux.text:
• works
super + e      rofi
super + v      dolphin
super + a      close window
super + 1      desktop 1
super + 3      desktop 3
super + 4      desktop 4
super + 5      desktop 5
super + 6      desktop 6
ctrl + print   capture rectangle

• doesn't work
super + t   terminal (konsole)
super + 2   desktop 2

linux.title: shortcuts shift
linux.text:
• works
super + shift + 1   move window to desktop 1
super + shift + 3   move window to desktop 3
super + shift + 4   move window to desktop 4
super + shift + 5   move window to desktop 5
super + shift + 6   move window to desktop 6

• doesn't work
super + shift + 2   move window to desktop 2
super + shift + f   fr keyboard
super + shift + a   ang keyboard

linux.title: cpu temperature
linux.text:
• cpu = central processing unit, equivalent to the brain of the pc

• meaning: 

 < 40° = not running anything
 > 40° = running something
 > 80° = not ideal throw pc out of window

linux.title: config colour
linux.text:
##9B79CC light purple
##f43539 red ish dark
##ff5555 red ish ligh
##efa570 orange ish
##84ed74 green ish
##62eac6 blue ish

all i can think of that u need to do is 
#tag:strikethrough:1. download a better file manager (i recommend thunar)#tag:strikethrough:
2. configure new keyboard shortcuts 
3. copy your launch script to the one of the WM you will use (for reference a WM is something every DE uses, and handles stuff like windows moving around etc... a WM has an option for auto-starting applications. So the plan is to use an independent WM that is not tied to a DE)
4. an application to change your wallpaper
